definition: key information/instructions/it must be borne in mind
Yokosuka (port and navy base in the Tokyo bay)
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
lit. whoever hung the bell on the tiger's neck must untie it (idiom)/fig. whoever started the trouble should end it
pinyin: jie3 ling2 hai2 xu1 xi4 ling2 ren2

definition: Yokosuka city and US naval base to the west of Yokohama, Japan
Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , zhong1 xu1 lu:4 ye4 fu2 chi2
containing_words.word: 牡丹雖好，終須綠葉扶持

sentences.english: The facility should have a process waste water discharge permit.
sentences.chinese: 受核工廠須領有加工廠廢水排放許可證。

sentences.english: The key account manager must possess significant skill to run a multi-million dollar business.
sentences.chinese: 大客戶經理須具備經營數百萬美元生意的重要技能。

sentences.english: Section 3. Cardholders are required to comply with this Code of Practice.
sentences.chinese: 第三條持卡人須遵守本守則。

sentences.english: Documents must be presented for negotiation within 10 days after shipment date.
sentences.chinese: 單據須正在拆船後10天內提示議付。

sentences.english: First, the government should allocate resources for promoting economic development.
sentences.chinese: 首先，預算案須撥出資源推動經濟發展。

sentences.english: Assign 2 hours to shipowner to control the vessel when on trial.
sentences.chinese: 在試航過程中，須分配兩小時給船東作自作操控。

sentences.english: Our days should be as carefully tended.
sentences.chinese: 我們的日子也應如此須得到細心照應。

sentences.english: The bank must be on top of 25 world bank.
sentences.chinese: 出證銀行排名須爲世界前25位內。

sentences.english: Raw Space Exhibitors have to carpet, design and construct their own floor space.
sentences.chinese: 展覽光地參展商須自行設計及蓋建展位，並鋪上地毯。

sentences.english: The Permit Holder shall provide portable toilet for the on- site construction workforce.
sentences.chinese: 許可證持有人須爲駐工地建築工人提供流動洗手間。

sentences.english: The right of claims are not possible to be realized or should not be realized completely.
sentences.chinese: 須數個並存的請求權不可能或不應當同時完全滿足。

sentences.english: People sometimes do have to pay part of the cost of drugs that doctor prescribes.
sentences.chinese: 人們有時須爲醫生處方付部份費用。

sentences.english: They had to wade knee-deep through mud and debris to reach the victims.
sentences.chinese: 他們須通過齊膝的爛泥和堆積物。

sentences.english: Everybody must observe the law not excepting the president.
sentences.chinese: 人人須守法，總統亦無例外。

sentences.english: S38:In case of insufficient ventilation, wear suitable respiratory equipment.
sentences.chinese: 通風不良時，須佩戴適當的呼吸器。

sentences.english: Before delivering the job, run the spelling and grammar checker once more, just for safety's sake.
sentences.chinese: 在交活兒以前，僅爲保險起見，須再運行一次拼寫。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
